data.eml:eml: Utrechts Landschap was established in 1927 and owns over 5,000 ha of nature in Utrecht. In addition, the foundation maintains mills, country estates, castles and old stone factories. Nearly all areas are open to the public and many walking routes have been developed.Positive observations without protocolDataset available via https://www.ndff.nl/english / serviceteamndff@natuurloket.nl65,816 records (March 2018)
